SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{ItemsId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{level}

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.priceDiscount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as priceDiscount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${Keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.priceDiscount asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT i.id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, i.sell_counts AS sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.priceDiscount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) as priceDiscount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id) tempSpec on i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1 AND i.cat_id = #{catId} order by
